short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow download telegram media from channels or groups with media protection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IMPORTANT, use the following telegram link to make this extension works
https://web.telegram.org/k/

- Displays the media controls hidden by telegram
- Download

- Display a popup with all the files fetched from the chat pagination that allows
- Preview the picture in the browser
- Download the media as well
- Download all the media with one button (zip or separate)
- Display the media dimensions and size

LIMITATIONS
- The extension can't do a massive download, you must navigate throught the chats in order to download per files or videos
- The extension can't save on the popup the media sent as file since content is fetched until you open the file on the preview
